welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sunset, a charming city known for its stunning sunsets and friendly atmosphere. Get ready to explore and experience all that Sunset has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Miami International Airport serves mainly domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The Central Terminal at Miami International Airport serves mainly international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Miami International Airport serves mainly domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the MIA-WiFi network and follow instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport handles all commercial and private aircraft operations.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport is used for private and corporate aircraft operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights and is the oldest terminal at FLL.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is connected to Terminal 3.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is connected to Terminal 2.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is the newest terminal at FLL.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
